aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.body:
Welcome to CMB Quiz Hub! We are dedicated to helping engineering students prepare for competitive exams like ISRO, GATE, and ESE.

Our platform provides high-quality, relevant quiz questions and past papers to help you succeed.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.body:
Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you!

You can reach out to us at example@email.com.

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.body: Want to help improve CMB Quiz Hub? We are always looking for contributions. You can help by submitting new questions, reporting errors, or suggesting features.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.body: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains what information we collect and how we use it...

isroRecruitmentGuide.title: ISRO Recruitment Guide
isroRecruitmentGuide.body: Here is a detailed guide on the ISRO recruitment process...

allAboutIsro.title: All About ISRO
allAboutIsro.body: Learn about the history, achievements, and future missions of the Indian Space Research Organisation.
